name: Hoopla
description:
An interactive and digital advertising agency, whose existence is aimed to development exceptional communication pieces. 
No one gets in trouble for being always the same. Nobody remembers what is already done. Our job is to push the limits. Improve your communication. We are a creative agency based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. We create strategies, designs and productions on every platform. We specialize in online/offline campaigns, social strategy and content creation, digital guidelines, branding, online films, websites, applications, activations, PPC optimization, and more. We are always looking for the latest trends to constantly innovate. At the end of the day, we are a strategic partner for the communication of modern brands.
